Table of Contents

Interface IDialogAware

Namespace
MVVMToolkitExtensions.WPF.Interfaces
Assembly
MVVMToolkitExtensions.WPF.dll

Provides methods to handle the lifecycle of a dialog window. Implementing this interface allows a ViewModel to control and respond to the opening and closing events of its associated dialog.

public interface IDialogAware

Remarks

Use this interface to manage the behavior and state of dialog windows within the application. This ensures that any necessary setup or cleanup actions are executed when the dialog is shown or dismissed.

Methods

CanCloseDialog()

Determines whether the dialog window can be closed.

bool CanCloseDialog()

Returns

bool

true if the dialog window can be closed; otherwise, false.

Remarks

This method allows the ViewModel to control the closing behavior of the dialog, such as preventing the dialog from being closed if certain conditions aren't met.

OnDialogClosed()

Invoked when the associated dialog window is closed or dismissed.

void OnDialogClosed()

Remarks

Implement this method to execute logic such as cleanup or state preservation when the dialog window is closed.

OnDialogOpened(DialogParameters)

Invoked when the associated dialog window is opened or shown.

void OnDialogOpened(DialogParameters parameters)

Parameters

parameters DialogParameters

A collection of key/value pairs passed to the dialog's ViewModel. This can be used to initialize the dialog with specific data or state.

Remarks

Use this method to handle any setup or initialization logic that needs to be executed when the dialog is first displayed.
